courseInfo:
Welcome 

This course gives you the resources, examples and playbook to successfully position Puppet's value in the marketplace. There are two components to this course: Puppet Sales Training and Puppet Sales Training: Quiz. 

Navigation

  • You may need to disable pop-up blockers for the Puppet Sales Training slideshow to play. You may also select the Launch button when it appears on your screen to start the slideshow in a different window.

  • Once you have completed the Puppet Sales Training slideshow, please close the pop-up window or tab to return to your course and complete Puppet Sales Training: Quiz. The course window may need a few seconds to refresh when you do this.

  • If at anytime you need to logout during the training, your progress will be saved.

  • Please note that you need to fully complete the entire Puppet Sales Training slideshow in addition to scoring a 70% or higher on the Puppet Sales Training: Quiz in order to successfully complete this training.

Good luck!
name: Welcome to Puppet Sales Training
